body:
To go to DCmC blog [Click here](https://dontcrushmycastle.wordpress.com/) ###Find Don't Crush My Castle on: * GitHub - https://github.com/demiurgosoft/dont-crush-my-castle * Wordpress - https://dontcrushmycastle.wordpress.com/ * GitHub Wiki - https://github.com/demiurgosoft/dont-crush-my-castle/wiki Want to participate? Send an email to demiurgosoft@hotmail.com or just start coding in [GitHub](https://github.com/demiurgosoft/dont-crush-my-castle), remember to check the wiki section [Getting Started](https://github.com/demiurgosoft/dont-crush-my-castle/wiki/Getting%20Started) **This Project is Open-Source under GNU GPL v3** ``` _______________________ / Don't Crush my Castle \ \ is a cool name / ----------------------- \ ^__^ \ (oo)\_______ (__)\ )\/\ ||----w | || || ``` Don't Crush My Castle Content is under CC License
